page.title: 08DAIRY FARM
page.content: My daddy is a{dairy farmer }up the Seskin Road. He milks one hundred and four cows. Daddy has two dogs called Rex and Nick. On the 5th June daddy started lifting{ silage} from Mr McKinstry's land on the Ballynure Road going into Ballyclare. Mr Mills is {helping}daddy by carting up silage for him in the six ninety. Mr Mills has two boys who go to Straid School. Graham Armstrong is helping to cart as well. Graham lives in Straid village. Bertie McDowell is helping to, he lived on a farm once but now he lives in Ballyclare. Daddy has cut the front field down which is three and a half acres. Daddy is hoping tomorrow stays {dry} so that he can draw the silage in. He has 50 acres of silage to make.
